00016 // Constants used for trigonometric convertions:
00017 static const double kRadiansToDegrees = 180.0 / 3.141592653589793238462643383279502884197169399375105820974944592307816406286208998628034825342117068;
00018 static const double kDegreesToRadians = 3.141592653589793238462643383279502884197169399375105820974944592307816406286208998628034825342117068 / 180.0;
00019 
00020 // This coeff is used in GainDataspace mapping MIDI to and from linear gain 
00021 // so that MIDI=100 equals 0 dB and MIDI = 127 equals +10 dB
00022 static const double kGainMidiPower = log(pow(10.,10./20.))/log(127./100.);
00023 static const double kGainMidiPowerInv = 1./kGainMidiPower;

00027 // Class Specification
00028

00030 // Specification for the base class of each DataspaceUnit
00031 // A DataspaceUnit converts from a specific unit to a neutral unit
00032 // and is used by a DataspaceLib to do a conversion
00033 class DataspaceUnit{
00034         public:
00035                 t_symbol *name;                         
00036 
00038                 DataspaceUnit(char *cName);
00039                 
00041                 virtual ~DataspaceUnit();
00042                 
00045                 virtual void convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output) = 0;
00046 
00049                 virtual void convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms) = 0;
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053

00056         private:

00058                 DataspaceUnit   *outUnit;
00059                 t_hashtab               *unitHash;
00060 
00061         protected:
00062                 void registerUnit(void *unit, t_symbol *unitName);
00063                 
00064         public:
00065                 t_symbol                *neutralUnit;
00066                 t_symbol                *name;
00067 
00074                 DataspaceLib(char *cName, char *cNeutralUnit);
00075                 
00077                 virtual ~DataspaceLib();
00078

00087
